competitiveness.translation[0].definitio: the ability of a company, country, or a product to compete with others
New machinery has enhanced the company’s productivity and competitiveness.
the desire to be more successful than other people
Her enthusiasm and competitiveness rubbed off on everyone.
competitiveness.translation[1].definitio: the ability of a product, company, or country to compete with others
The currency’s higher value will hurt competitiveness by making Taiwan’s exports more expensive for foreign buyers.
